alert.note: Alert for Cassia; Minidoka (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 11 at 10:55PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Idaho and southeast Idaho, including the following counties, in south central Idaho, Minidoka. In southeast Idaho, Cassia. HWY 30 from Burley to Twin Falls has several areas with water over the road way especially from 900 west to 200 west. * WHEN...Until 200 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1054 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Burley, Heyburn, Declo, Interstate 84 And 86 Junction and Yale Rest Area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
